name: AnyDLBot
description: Telegram's best YouTube Downloader. Create your Fork now.

WEBHOOK.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable webhooks when in env mode

TG_BOT_TOKEN.description: Your bot token, as a string.

PORT.description: Port to use for your webhooks

AUTH_USERS.description: allow only pre-defined users to use this bot

CHUNK_SIZE.description: chunk size that should be used with requests
